name: Broadcom Inc.
summary: Broadcom Inc. is a leading global technology company specializing in the design, development, and supply of semiconductor and infrastructure software solutions. With a diverse portfolio serving data centers, networking, broadband, wireless, storage, and industrial markets, Broadcom has established itself as a critical enabler of AI infrastructure and enterprise software. The company is publicly traded, headquartered in Palo Alto, California, and surpassed a $1 trillion market capitalization in 2024.
